mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CD AS VALUE, MENU_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_MENU WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND HIR_MENU_CD = 'M001'
SELECT ATH_CD AS VALUE, ATH_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_ATH WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PLNT_CD = #{plantCd}
SELECT TREE_CD AS VALUE, TREE_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_CD_TREE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND HIR_TREE_CD = #{value}
SELECT USER_ID AS VALUE, USER_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_USER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PLNT_CD = #{plantCd}
SELECT DPT_CD AS VALUE, DPT_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_DPT WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND HIR_DPT_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT ANS_CYL_CD AS VALUE, ANS_CYL_MARK_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_ANS_CYL WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT AMITM_CD AS VALUE, VRIA_KN AS LABEL FROM MS_AMITM

SELECT A.USER_ID AS VALUE, (B.DPT_NM || '/' || A.USER_NM) AS LABEL FROM SY_USER A JOIN SY_DPT B ON A.DPT_CD = B.DPT_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND B.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.APR_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.USER_ID AS VALUE, (B.DPT_NM || '/' || A.USER_NM) AS LABEL FROM SY_USER A JOIN SY_DPT B ON A.DPT_CD = B.DPT_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND B.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.REVW_YN = 'Y'
SELECT PLNT_CD AS VALUE, PLNT_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_PLNT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ORD
SELECT YEAR AS VALUE, YEAR || 'ë…„' AS LABEL FROM SY_CALD GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY YEAR

SELECT TREE_CD AS VALUE, LTRIM(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TREE_NM, '.'), '.') AS LABEL FROM SY_CD_TREE WHERE 1=1
AND HIR_TREE_CD = #{value}
AND HIR_TREE_CD IN ('R1000000','R2000000','R3000000','R4000000')
START WITH HIR_TREE_CD = 'R0000000' CONNECT BY PRIOR TREE_CD = HIR_TREE_CD
SELECT ST.ANS_TRM_CD AS VALUE , ST.ANS_TRM_MARK_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_ANS_TRM ST WHERE 1 = 1 AND ST.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ST.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ST.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ST.TRM_ORD
